channel.title: Safe Zones
channel.description:
Hi this is my first post to moparisthebest.com and its about help please
If someone could help me I need to figure out how to do safe zones in the tutorial list It dosent say anything about it help please.

item.title: Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Im just going to jump into this before the blood begins to spill…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,121820.0.html

I found this within like 3 mins of seaching, and i would find a tut if i didnt feel extremly tired. So a breif description of the url. Go into your client.java, edit, seach, nonwild, then you will scroll down and see a list of stuff like this

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431) || (absX >= 2908 && absX <= 2889 && absY >= 3573 && absY <= 3554) || (absX >= 2936 && absX <= 3061 && absY >= 3327 && absY <= 3407) || (absX >= 2827 && absX <= 2866 && absY >= 9547 && absY <= 9569) || (absX >= 3042 && absX <= 3279 && absY >= 3396 && absY <= 3523) || (absX >= 2435 && absX <= 2448 && absY >= 3080 && absY <= 3102) || (absX >= 3329 && absX <= 3241 && absY >= 3365 && absY <= 3261) || (absX >= 2799 && absX <= 2861 && absY >= 3419 && absY <= 3480) || (absX >= 2730 && absX <= 3462 && absY >= 2745 && absY <= 3475) || (absX >= 2708 && absX <= 2735 && absY >= 4883 && absY <= 4913) || (absX >= 3110 && absX <= 3125 && absY >= 9829 && absY <= 9853) || (absX >= 2839 && absX <= 2849

Ok, then look at the url, look at the reply to the post. And he basically explains how to fill in what you want for the safe zone you want.

Hope I helped, and lets keep the fighting to minimum.
-Sexy Slay

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Zones

item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:17, topic:288881”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=381904.msg2945350#msg2945350 date=1252187523]
Ontopic: Above post is true, but people don’t know how to “search”. It’s too advanced for the tweenagers these days!
Offtopic: Your sig has a spelling error. XD
I hope the information I have provided for you has helpED you in some sort of way or need. Please Ask questions if you need more help.
[/quote]

  1. So you’re 30?
  2. Oh no hes goin to hell!!!
  3. you didn’t give him information

ontopic:

public boolean nonWild

If you can’t understand the above, then you’re retarded.[/quote]

  1. I’m 17.
  2. I’m a girl? o.o’
  3. I helped emphasis the topic above my post.
    –4. Why call people retarded when they’re new to coding. You can’t say you understand public booleans immidiately. Nobody did, except maybe the developers of java language, when they thought of it. ^^"
